Courses.title: Our courses
Courses.introduction: Bloom courses offer tailored information, tools, and affirming words to help us cope with trauma. They encourage us to learn, reflect, and process what we’ve been through and how it may have affected us–all in a safe and empowering space.
Courses.noCourses: There are no courses to display right now. If this doesn't seem right, try again later or contact the Bloom team.

courseDetail.introductionDescription: Watch the introduction video or read the <transcriptLink>video transcript</transcriptLink>.

sessionDetail.videoDescription: Watch the video or read the <transcriptLink>video transcript</transcriptLink>.
sessionDetail.chatDescription: If you’d like to share your reflections on this session, or there’s something you want to chat about, the Bloom team are here to listen.

accessGuard.title: Course content not available
accessGuard.introduction: Your Bloom account does not include access to the requested course content. Go back to your <contactLink>courses</contactLink>.

errors.completeSessionError: There was an error marking this session as complete. Try again a little later.
